title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 104.4 - Reproduction of court records in an alternative format
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 104.4 - Reproduction of court records in an alternative format

State Regulations
(a) All contracts, processes, procedures and apparatus for the reproduction of court records in an
alternative format shall be subject to prior approval by the Deputy Chief

Administrator for Management Support. (b) Court records that have been
reproduced pursuant to subdivision (a) of this section may be disposed of
pursuant to section
104.3
of this Part, provided that
the reproductions are satisfactorily identified and indexed, are in a format
that allows for accurate reproduction, and are stored in a facility approved by
the Deputy Chief Administrator for Management Support. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
104.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
